additionalInformation: The item's attributes grants the following additional bonuses:
name: Sange
description: Sange is an unusually accurate weapon, seeking weak points automatically.
trivia: This item is named after Sange, a weapon from the Phantasy Star Online series.
Sange is a Japanese word for scattering flowers as an offering to Buddha and a metaphor for falling in battle.
Riki's cosmetic item, Sange the Backseeker, is based on Sange.
